item.title: Set Gtk File Picker
item.description: I’m using Archcraft with bspwm right now. It uses qt applications as default mostly. I don’t like the default qt file picker dialog it uses. And couldn’t find any good guideline to change the picker. So I’m going to write down a workaround I got from @ahmubashshir. We need some dependencies : qt5ct kvantum-qt5 xdg-desktop-portal-gtk Create a config file under ~/qt5ct/qt5ct.conf with the following content : 1 2 3 [Appearance] standard_dialogs=gtk3 style=kvantum-dark Now set the following environment variable at startup.
